item.title: style your Linux terminal
item.description: These days I stumbled across an article that describes how to design the Linux terminal. I have seen such terminals before in tutorial videos or something similar. But I thought this is reserved for Mac users. I was happy to see it’s available to Linux users as well. It works even in WSL. If you would like to customize your terminal to a good looking one like this one, follow the instruction on it’s GitHub repository.
